text: Avhane is a village of Shevgaon Taluka of Ahmednagar district in the state of Maharashtra, India. It is about northeast of Ahmednagar and from Aurangabad. This village is split in two parts as Avahne Budruk and Avhane Khurda . Avhane Budruk is famous for the temple of "Nidrista Ganapati", the Ganapati in the sleeping pose. There are only two Nidrista Ganapati: one in Chinchwad (Morya Gosavi), near Pune, and another one in the Avahne. ==References== Category:Villages in Ahmednagar district
title: Avhane
